timeline.message:
ColorRGB - allow parsing from string
- While this may seem useless, its just helping be able to use rgb colors for particles

VisualEffect - more fixes
- Better support for legacy versions
- Added support for colors with SPELL_MOB and SPELL_MOB_AMBIENT partciles

timeline.bodyText: Maybe you could add a helper function for testing if input is a ColorRGB String in ColorRGB itself? Rather than doing the check here
timeline.author: Wealthyturtle

timeline.message: ColorRGB - add method to check if a string can be parsed as an RGB color
Update line endings and copyright header
